code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import countReducer from'../reducers/countReducer';import usersReducer from'../reducers/usersReducer';import postsReducer from'../reducers/postsReducer';import commentsReducers from'../reducers/commentsReducer';var configureStore=function configureStore(){var store=createStore(combineReducers({count:countReducer,users:usersReducer,posts:postsReducer,comments:commentsReducers}),applyMiddleware(thunk));return store;};export default configureStore;
